Title: Relates to exemptions from preauthorization requirements in certain circumstances
Summary: Exempts health care professionals from preauthorization requirements where the insurer or health care plan has approved not less than ninety percent of such professional's preauthorization requests in the preceding six-month evaluation period.
LawCode: Amd ยง4902, Ins L; amd ยง4902, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to exempting health care professionals from preauthorization requirements in certain circumstances
